dict.acceptation: 得到或接受某部分东西；

sent.orig: Participate academic chair of organize the school, participate to sponsor the large job advertisement meeting.
sent.trans: 参与组织校内讲座，参与主办大型招聘会。

sent.orig: Villager 1: i want to participate too for tomorrow village. I will participate.
sent.trans: 乡民1：我也要参加，我要替明日乡出点力。我要参加。

sent.orig: User fees or other costs to participate in a computer network system vary considerably.
sent.trans: 用户为加入计算机网系统而付的费用或其它费用差别很大。

sent.orig: Participate in the debugging of hardware system.
Develop and maintain orderly accounting systems and participate in regulating the generally accepted accounting standards.
sent.trans: 发展和完善财务制度，使之规范化。
